info: Adept in web development, I bring digital visions to life through captivating and user-centric online experiences.
Proficient in Flutter, I craft captivating mobile experiences that bridge imagination and technology.
Skilled in embedded system development, I transform concepts into functional realities, merging innovation with technology.
Skilled in C#-based desktop application development and adept in Python scripting, I specialize in creating powerful and versatile software solutions.
